You are here:

SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
SERVICE CLOUD

Get rid of tiered support and start swarming in just a few steps. You can choose to keep swarm collaboration on the Salesforce record, or swarm with Slack.

Turn On Swarming
To begin swarming on customer issues and reduce customer resolution times, turn on Swarming.
Set Up Swarming User Permissions
Give users the permissions that they need to swarm on a record in Lightning Experience. 
Set Up Your Service Console for Swarming
Optimize the agent swarming experience 
Configure Swarming Flows
Preconfigured swarming flow templates help agents quickly start swarms, add members, and close swarms from a record in Salesforce.
Set Up Expert Finder for Swarming
Expert Finder is powered by Omni-Channel and skills-based routing.
Set Up a Collaboration Tool for Swarming
Connect Slack to Salesforce or enable Feed Tracking for the Swarm object.
title: Implementing Swarming in Service Cloud
